name: zipsuit
description: A skintight and snug body suit.  Mostly made from a transparent latex, it's designed to cover only risky places by a simple zipper.

name: schoolgirl uniform
description: An upper garment with a peculiar collar and torso design.  It is popular worldwide from the late 19th century to the early 20th century, and is wildly spread in cosplay culture as well as being used as a uniform for female students in Japan.
